!Master Terry: I think you are ready for the next task. Being contaminated by a Dark Bezoar is somewhat worrisome, but according to Marina's research, the contamination is limited to only a few creatures. You must destroy those hosts. *Marsh Stakato Drones*, *Breka Orc Overlords*, *Ant Warrior Captains*, and *Leto Lizardman Warriors* are the monsters you must hunt. Of course, these creatures all have *aggressive tendencies*. Extract the Dark Bezoars from their bodies. Do you know where they are?? [Quest _213_TrialOfSeeker terry_q0213_19.htm|"Where are they?"]
